input.jujutsuaddon.vow.name: Vow Name
label.jujutsuaddon.vow.name: Name:
hint.jujutsuaddon.vow.add_more_condition: Add more conditions to unlock benefits
§cForbidden§7 to use cursed techniques from %s to %s
§aOnly allowed§7 to use cursed techniques from %s to %s
condition.jujutsu_addon.time_range.mecha:
§4⚠ Hard Restriction§r
Violating this condition triggers penalties!
For players seeking high risk, high reward
condition.jujutsu_addon.overtime.mechani:
§6✦ Benefit Modifier§r
• Overtime (%s-%s): Benefits apply normally
• Regular hours (%d hrs): Benefits are §creversed§r

§7Example: +20%% CE → +20%% during overtime, -20%% otherwise
§aNo penalties§7, beginner friendly
gui.jujutsuaddon.vow.weight_explanation:
§b§l【Binding Weight Guide】§r

§eWeight§7 is the core currency of Binding Vows:
• Add §bConditions§7 to gain weight points
• Spend weight points on §6Benefits§r

§cHarsher conditions = More weight = Stronger benefits§r

§7Examples:
• No cursed techniques during day (12h) → §b+2.5 weight§r
• Overtime binding (modifier) → §b+1.8 weight§r (capped)
condition.jujutsu_addon.ability_ban.desc: Permanently forbids the use of a specific ability in exchange for benefits.
vow.condition.ability_ban.desc: Permanently forbids the use of %s in exchange for benefits.
condition.jujutsu_addon.chant_required.d: Must complete at least %s chants before using
condition.jujutsu_addon.recoil.desc: Take %s%% recoil damage after using abilities
benefit.jujutsu_addon.world_slash_bypass: Binding Vow: World Slash Chant Bypass
Allows the user to cast World Slash without the required chants, bypassing the casting time.
penalty.jujutsu_addon.technique_seal.des: Seal techniques for %d seconds on violation
vow.guide.title: 【 Binding Vow System 】
vow.guide.what_is_weight.title: ▸ What is Weight?
vow.guide.what_is_weight.desc1: Weight is the core 'currency' of Binding Vows.
vow.guide.what_is_weight.desc2: Add conditions to gain weight, spend weight for benefits.
vow.guide.how_it_works.title: ▸ How It Works
vow.guide.how_it_works.step1: ① Choose conditions → Gain weight points
vow.guide.how_it_works.step2: ② Choose benefits → Spend weight points
vow.guide.how_it_works.step3: ③ Weight ≥ Cost to create a vow
vow.guide.condition_types.title: ▸ Condition Types
vow.guide.condition_types.violation: ⚠ Hard Restriction: Violation triggers penalty, more weight
vow.guide.condition_types.modifier: ✦ Benefit Modifier: Adjusts effects dynamically, capped weight
vow.guide.tips.title: ▸ Tips
vow.guide.tips.tip2: • Permanent vows can't be dissolved but gain bonus weight
vow.tooltip.weight.title: 【Weight System】
vow.tooltip.weight.line1: Conditions provide weight, benefits consume it
vow.condition_type.modifier.desc: No penalties, but dynamically adjusts benefits
vow.message.contains_used_pair: Cannot activate: This vow contains a condition-benefit combination that has already been used before.
tooltip.jujutsuaddon.vow.exhausted: The one-time effect of this vow has been used.
